name: Gmk-splitter
tagline: Tool for splitting Game Maker .gmk files into a tree of xml and resource files and to reassemble this tree into a new .gmk file
body:
### Welcome to GmkSplitter
These pages are really minimal so far and contain only the current download links.

### Download
At the moment, you can still download GmkSplitter on the Github downloads page:
https://github.com/Medo42/Gmk-Splitter/downloads

However, since this service will be discontinued soon, we're working on creating a new home for these files.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
